sentences.en: Apply oracle patches and upgrade Oracle software and databases.
sentences.cn: 应用oracle的补丁程序,更新Oracle软件和数据库.

sentences.en: Bitmap indexes are integrated with the Oracle optimizer and execution engine.
sentences.cn: 位图索引是集成在Oracle的优化器和运行执行引擎中的.

sentences.en: Diagnose and tune the performance of Oracle database applications.
sentences.cn: Oracle数据库应用程序性能诊断和调优.

sentences.en: In times of difficulty, she pray for an oracle to guide her.
sentences.cn: 在困难的时候, 她祈祷神谕来指引她.

sentences.en: It is animportant task for system administrator to manage the Oracle database.
sentences.cn: 因此,管理好Oracle数据库是系统管理员的一项重要工作.

sentences.en: OpenWorks facilitates this by taking advantage of ORACLE's AUTOEXTEND capability.
sentences.cn: 利用Oracle的 AUTOEXTEND特性,OpenWorks可以方便地实现这一要求.

sentences.en: Oracle and Microsoft were both born in difficult economic times.
sentences.cn: Oracle和Microsoft正是在经济困难的时代诞生的.

sentences.en: Our company develops client - server systems and databases in MS SQL and Oracle.
sentences.cn: 我们公司MSSQL和Oracle开发了客户服务系统和数据库.

sentences.en: Soft ware platform is UNIX operation system and ORACLE data base.
sentences.cn: 软件平台采用UNIX操作系统和ORACLE数据库.

sentences.en: The earth is the great parent of all, the stones are her bones ; these we may cast behind us; this, I think, the oracle means.
sentences.cn: 大地是万物之母, 石头就是她的尸骨.我们可以往身后扔 石头, 我想神谕说的就是这个意思.

sentences.en: The people were much puzzled by this answer of the oracle.
sentences.cn: 大家对神使的回答感到非常惶惑.

sentences.en: The Sibyl gave no aid to restoring them again, and the oracle was irreparably lost.
sentences.cn: 西比尔不会把它们恢复原状, 神谕便无可弥补地丢失了.

sentences.en: They consulted the oracle at Delphi.
sentences.cn: 他们在德尔斐神示所向神请示。

sentences.en: They sought the woods, and revolved the oracle in their minds.
sentences.cn: 他们躲进树林, 苦苦思索着神谕的含义.

sentences.en: This oracle was still flourishing in 332 B.C.
sentences.cn: 这个神示殿在公元前332年依然很兴旺.

phrases.tran_cn: 甲骨（中国商朝用来刻写占卜文字的龟甲兽骨）

trans.tran_en: someone who the ancient Greeks believed could communicate with the gods, who gave advice to people or told them what would happen
